This action cannot target markers in base contact with
anon-peon enemy model.

2. Remove one Scheme marker within range.
3. Resolve a specific rule that refers to an

if it is engaged.

play.

assassinate.name: Assassinate
assassinate.setup_text:
When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a unique
enemy mode! that has half or more of its maximum health
remaining. You may want to ask about the health of multiple
models (even if you do not select this scheme) to fool
your opponent.
assassinate.scoring_text: When this scheme is revealed, gain 1 VP.
assassinate.additional_vp_text:
At the end of the turn on which this scheme was
revealed, if the chosen model has been killed, gain 1
additional VP.
assassinate.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme after the chosen modelis
reduced to below half of its maximum health.
assassinate.raw_text:
ASSASSINATE

SCORED vP: L) OL)

When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a unique
enemy mode! that has half or more of its maximum health
remaining. You may want to ask about the health of multiple
models (even if you do not select this scheme) to fool
your opponent.

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme after the chosen modelis
reduced to below half of its maximum health.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

At the end of the turn on which this scheme was
revealed, if the chosen model has been killed, gain 1
additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Scout the Rooftops
Detonate Charges
Runic Binding

breakthrough.name: Breakthrough
breakthrough.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, remove one friendly
Scheme marker in the enemy deployment zone that
does not have an enemy model within 2" of it to gain1
VP.
breakthrough.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed you may also remove one
friendly Scheme marker from the centerline and one
friendly Scheme marker from your deployment zone to
gain 1 additional VP.
breakthrough.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model ends
its activation.
breakthrough.raw_text:
BREAKTHROUGH

SCORED vP: L) OL)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model ends
its activation.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, remove one friendly
Scheme marker in the enemy deployment zone that
does not have an enemy model within 2" of it to gain1
VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed you may also remove one
friendly Scheme marker from the centerline and one
friendly Scheme marker from your deployment zone to
gain 1 additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Assassinate
Public Demonstration
Frame Job

detonate_charges.name: Detonate Charges
detonate_charges.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, remove two friendly
Scheme markers that are within 2" of enemy model(s)
to gain 1 VP.
detonate_charges.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed you may remove one
additional qualifying Scheme marker to gain 1 additional
VP.
detonate_charges.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
detonate_charges.raw_text:
DETONATE CHARGES

SCORED vP: L) OL)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, remove two friendly
Scheme markers that are within 2" of enemy model(s)
to gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed you may remove one
additional qualifying Scheme marker to gain 1 additional
VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES
Grave Robbing
Runic Binding
Take the Highground

ensnare.name: Ensnare
ensnare.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, remove two friendly
Scheme markers from within 2" a single unique enemy
model to gain 1 VP.
ensnare.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, if the enemy unique
model is engaged by a model of lower cost, gain 1
additional VP.
ensnare.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model ends
its activation.
ensnare.raw_text:
ENSNARE

SCORED vP: L) OL)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model ends
its activation.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, remove two friendly
Scheme markers from within 2" a single unique enemy
model to gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed, if the enemy unique
model is engaged by a model of lower cost, gain 1
additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Reshape the Land
Search the Area
Frame Job

frame_job.name: Frame Job
frame_job.setup_text:
When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a
friendly model.
frame_job.scoring_text: When this scheme is revealed, gain 1 VP.
frame_job.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, you may remove one
friendly Scheme marker from within 2" of the chosen
model to gain 1 additional VP.
frame_job.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme after the chosen model
suffers damage from an enemy attack action targeting it
while it is on the enemy table half.
frame_job.raw_text:
FRAME JOB

SCORED vP: L) OL)

When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a
friendly model.
REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme after the chosen model
suffers damage from an enemy attack action targeting it
while it is on the enemy table half.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed, you may remove one
friendly Scheme marker from within 2" of the chosen
model to gain 1 additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Public Demonstration
Harness the Leyline
Scout the Rooftops

grave_robbing.name: Grave Robbing
grave_robbing.setup_text:
When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a type of
non-Scheme marker.
grave_robbing.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, remove one friendly
Scheme marker within 2" of the killed model to gain 1 VP.
grave_robbing.additional_vp_text:
Until the end of the turn, friendly models may target
enemy Remains markers with the Interact action to
remove them and place them on your crew card. At the
end of the turn remove all Remains markers from your
crew card that were placed this way. If two or more are
removed, gain 1 additional VP.
grave_robbing.reveal_condition:
After killing an enemy model within 2" of both one or
more friendly Scheme marker(s) and one or more of the
chosen marker, reveal this scheme.
next_available_schemes: Make it Look Like an Accident
grave_robbing.raw_text:
GRAVE ROBBING

SCORED vP: L) OL)

When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a type of
non-Scheme marker.

REVEAL

After killing an enemy model within 2" of both one or
more friendly Scheme marker(s) and one or more of the
chosen marker, reveal this scheme.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, remove one friendly
Scheme marker within 2" of the killed model to gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

Until the end of the turn, friendly models may target
enemy Remains markers with the Interact action to
remove them and place them on your crew card. At the
end of the turn remove all Remains markers from your
crew card that were placed this way. If two or more are
removed, gain 1 additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Runic Binding
Leave Your Mark
Make it Look Like an Accident

harness.name: Harness
harness.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, remove two friendly
Scheme markers on the centerline not within 6” of
another marker used to score this scheme and that do
not have any enemy models within 2" to gain 1 VP.
harness.additional_vp_text:
Remove one additional qualifying marker to gain 1
additional VP.
harness.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
harness.raw_text:
HARNESS
THE LEYLINE

SCORED vP: LJ)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, remove two friendly
Scheme markers on the centerline not within 6” of
another marker used to score this scheme and that do
not have any enemy models within 2" to gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

Remove one additional qualifying marker to gain 1
additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Assassinate
Scout the Rooftops
Grave Robbing

leave_your_mark.name: Leave Your Mark
leave_your_mark.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, if there are more friendly
Scheme markers within 1" of the centerpoint than
enemy Scheme markers within 1" of the centerpoint,
gain1 VP. Then, remove all friendly Scheme markers
within 1" of the centerpoint.
leave_your_mark.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, if there are at least
two more friendly Scheme markers within 1" of the
centerpoint than enemy Scheme markers within 1" of
the centerpoint, gain 1 additional VP.
leave_your_mark.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
next_available_schemes: Make it Look Like an Accident
leave_your_mark.raw_text:
LEAVE YOUR MARK

SCORED vP: L) OL)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, if there are more friendly
Scheme markers within 1" of the centerpoint than
enemy Scheme markers within 1" of the centerpoint,
gain1 VP. Then, remove all friendly Scheme markers
within 1" of the centerpoint.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed, if there are at least
two more friendly Scheme markers within 1" of the
centerpoint than enemy Scheme markers within 1" of
the centerpoint, gain 1 additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Take the Highground
Make it Look Like an Accident
Reshape the Land

make_it_look_like.name: Make It Look Like
make_it_look_like.scoring_text: When this scheme is revealed, gain 1 VP.
make_it_look_like.additional_vp_text:
If at the end of the turn on which this scheme was
revealed the enemy model that fell has been killed
or has less than half of its maximum health, gain 1
additional VP.
make_it_look_like.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model
suffers damage due to falling.
make_it_look_like.raw_text:
MAKE IT LOOK LIKE
AN ACCIDENT

SCORED vP: LJ)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model
suffers damage due to falling.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

If at the end of the turn on which this scheme was
revealed the enemy model that fell has been killed
or has less than half of its maximum health, gain 1
additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Ensnare
Reshape the Land
Breakthrough

public.name: Public
public.setup_text:
When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a unique
enemy model.
public.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, if there are two or more
friendly minions within 2” of the chosen model, gain
1VP.
public.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, remove a friendly
Scheme marker from within 1” of the chosen model to
gain 1 additional VP.
public.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
public.raw_text:
PUBLIC
DEMONSTRATION

SCORED vP: LJ)

When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a unique
enemy model.

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, if there are two or more
friendly minions within 2” of the chosen model, gain
1VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

Scheme marker from within 1” of the chosen model to
gain 1 additional VP.

reshape_the_land.name: Reshape The Land
reshape_the_land.setup_text: When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a marker type.
reshape_the_land.scoring_text:
If there are four friendly markers of the chosen type
completely on the enemy table half, gain 1 VP. Then,
if the chosen marker type was Scheme, remove all
markers used to score this scheme.
reshape_the_land.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, if there are five friendly
markers of the chosen type completely on the enemy
table half, gain 1 additional VP.
reshape_the_land.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
reshape_the_land.raw_text:
RESHAPE THE LAND

SCORED vP: L) OL)

When this scheme is selected, secretly choose a marker type.

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

If there are four friendly markers of the chosen type
completely on the enemy table half, gain 1 VP. Then,
if the chosen marker type was Scheme, remove all
markers used to score this scheme.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed, if there are five friendly
markers of the chosen type completely on the enemy
table half, gain 1 additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Search the Area
Breakthrough
Public Demonstration

runic_binding.name: Runic Binding
runic_binding.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, choose three friendly
Scheme markers in play. Each chosen marker must be
within 14" of at least one of the other chosen markers.
If there is at least one enemy model within the area
formed between the chosen markers, gain 1 VP. Remove
the chosen markers.
runic_binding.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, if the combined cost of
the enemy models in that area is 15 or greater, gain 1
additional VP.
runic_binding.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model ends
its activation.
runic_binding.raw_text:
RUNIC BINDING

SCORED vP: L) OL)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme when an enemy model ends
its activation.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, choose three friendly
Scheme markers in play. Each chosen marker must be
within 14" of at least one of the other chosen markers.
If there is at least one enemy model within the area
formed between the chosen markers, gain 1 VP. Remove
the chosen markers.

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed, if the combined cost of
the enemy models in that area is 15 or greater, gain 1
additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Leave Your Mark
Take the Highground
Ensnare

scout_the_rooftops.name: Scout The Rooftops
scout_the_rooftops.scoring_text:
Scheme markers are qualifying for this scheme if they:

* Are not within 6" of your deployment zone.

* Do not have an enemy model at the same elevation
within 2".

* Areat elevation 2 or higher.

When this scheme is revealed, remove one qualifying

Scheme marker from two different terrain pieces to gain

1VP (two Scheme markers total).
scout_the_rooftops.additional_vp_text:
When this scheme is revealed, select one additional
qualifying Scheme marker that is completely on the
enemy table half and remove it to gain 1 VP. Note that
this Scheme marker may be on the same terrain piece as
one of the other qualifying Scheme markers.
scout_the_rooftops.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
scout_the_rooftops.raw_text:
SCOUT THE ROOFTOPS

SCORED vP: L))

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

Scheme markers are qualifying for this scheme if they:

* Are not within 6" of your deployment zone.

* Do not have an enemy model at the same elevation
within 2".

* Areat elevation 2 or higher.

When this scheme is revealed, remove one qualifying

Scheme marker from two different terrain pieces to gain

1VP (two Scheme markers total).

ADDITIONAL VP

When this scheme is revealed, select one additional
qualifying Scheme marker that is completely on the
enemy table half and remove it to gain 1 VP. Note that
this Scheme marker may be on the same terrain piece as
one of the other qualifying Scheme markers.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Detonate Charges
Grave Robbing
Leave Your Mark

search_the_area.name: Search The Area
search_the_area.scoring_text:
When this scheme is revealed, select a piece of terrain
completely on the enemy table half. Remove three
friendly Scheme markers from within 1" of the selected
terrain that do not have enemy models within 2" of
them to gain 1 VP.
search_the_area.additional_vp_text:
At the end of the turn on which this scheme was
revealed, you may remove one friendly Scheme marker
from within 1" of the selected terrain to gain 1 VP.
search_the_area.reveal_condition:
You may reveal this scheme at the end of any enemy
activation.
search_the_area.raw_text:
SEARCH THE AREA

SCORED vP: L) OL)

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any enemy
activation.

SCORING

When this scheme is revealed, select a piece of terrain
completely on the enemy table half. Remove three
friendly Scheme markers from within 1" of the selected
terrain that do not have enemy models within 2" of
them to gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

At the end of the turn on which this scheme was
revealed, you may remove one friendly Scheme marker
from within 1" of the selected terrain to gain 1 VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES

Breakthrough
Frame Job
Harness the Leyline

take_the.name: Take The
take_the.setup_text:
A crew is considered to control a terrain piece if it has the
most friendly models standing on it. This crew's models that
are within 6" of their deployment zone are ignored.
take_the.scoring_text:
When you reveal this scheme, if you control at least two
Ht 2 or greater terrain pieces gain 1 VP.
take_the.additional_vp_text:
If you control at least three qualifying terrain pieces gain
1 additional VP.
take_the.reveal_condition: You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.
next_available_schemes: Make it Look Like an Accident
take_the.raw_text:
TAKE THE
HIGHGROUND

SCORED vP: LJ)

A crew is considered to control a terrain piece if it has the
most friendly models standing on it. This crew's models that
are within 6" of their deployment zone are ignored.

REVEAL

You may reveal this scheme at the end of any turn.

SCORING

When you reveal this scheme, if you control at least two
Ht 2 or greater terrain pieces gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

If you control at least three qualifying terrain pieces gain
1 additional VP.

NEXT AVAILABLE SCHEMES
Make it Look Like an Accident

Ensnare
Search the Area

boundary_dispute.name: Boundary Dispute
boundary_dispute.setup_text:
After deployment zones are chosen, starting with the
attacker, each player alternates making three Strategy
markers completely in their deployment zone, not
within 6" of another Strategy marker.
boundary_dispute.rules_text:
Strategy markers are friendly to the player that made
them. A model may target a Strategy marker with
the Interact action to place it within 6" of its current
location, not in base contact with any model(s).
boundary_dispute.scoring_text:
At the end of every turn, the crew with the most friendly
Strategy markers completely on the enemy table half
gains 1 VP. Strategy markers completely in the enemy
deployment zone are counted twice. In the case of a tie,
both crews gain 1 VP.

Then the crew that has scored the least total VP from
this strategy this game may select any one friendly
Strategy marker and place it within 4" of its current
location, not in base contact with any model(s).
boundary_dispute.additional_vp_text:
Double any victory points gained from this strategy on
turn 4.
boundary_dispute.raw_text:
BOUNDARY DISPUTE

scorepD vP: QOOO0

SETUP

After deployment zones are chosen, starting with the
attacker, each player alternates making three Strategy
markers completely in their deployment zone, not
within 6" of another Strategy marker.

RULES

Strategy markers are friendly to the player that made
them. A model may target a Strategy marker with
the Interact action to place it within 6" of its current
location, not in base contact with any model(s).

SCORING

At the end of every turn, the crew with the most friendly
Strategy markers completely on the enemy table half
gains 1 VP. Strategy markers completely in the enemy
deployment zone are counted twice. In the case of a tie,
both crews gain 1 VP.

Then the crew that has scored the least total VP from
this strategy this game may select any one friendly
Strategy marker and place it within 4" of its current
location, not in base contact with any model(s).

ADDITIONAL VP

Double any victory points gained from this strategy on
turn 4.

informants.name: Informants
informants.setup_text:
After deployment zones are chosen, make five Strategy

markers:

¢ One centered on the centerpoint.

* Two centered on the centerline, each 10" to the left
and right of the centerpoint, respectively.

¢ Starting with the attacker, each player alternates
making one Strategy marker in the center of one table
quarter completely on their side of the board.
informants.rules_text:
Acrew controls a Strategy marker if it has more models
without Summon tokens within 2" of the marker than
any opponent does.
informants.scoring_text:
At the end of every turn, the crew controlling the most
Strategy markers gains 1 VP. In the case of atie, both
crews gain 1 VP.

Then the crew that has scored the least total VP
from this strategy this game selects up to two Strategy
markers and places them within 3" of their location, not
in base contact with any model(s) or within 8" of any
other Strategy marker(s).
informants.additional_vp_text:
Double any victory points gained from this strategy on
turn 4.
informants.raw_text:
INFORMANTS

scorepD vP: QOOO0

SETUP

After deployment zones are chosen, make five Strategy

markers:

¢ One centered on the centerpoint.

* Two centered on the centerline, each 10" to the left
and right of the centerpoint, respectively.

¢ Starting with the attacker, each player alternates
making one Strategy marker in the center of one table
quarter completely on their side of the board.

RULES

Acrew controls a Strategy marker if it has more models
without Summon tokens within 2" of the marker than
any opponent does.

SCORING

At the end of every turn, the crew controlling the most
Strategy markers gains 1 VP. In the case of atie, both
crews gain 1 VP.

Then the crew that has scored the least total VP
from this strategy this game selects up to two Strategy
markers and places them within 3" of their location, not
in base contact with any model(s) or within 8" of any
other Strategy marker(s).

ADDITIONAL VP

Double any victory points gained from this strategy on
turn 4.

plant_explosives.name: Plant Explosives
plant_explosives.setup_text:
After deployment, each non-peon model in play gains
an Explosive token.
plant_explosives.rules_text:
A model with an Explosive token may take the Interact
action to remove the token and make a friendly Strategy
marker within 1", and not within 4" of another friendly
Strategy marker. Explosive tokens may not be removed
in any other way.

A model may target a Strategy marker with the
Interact action to remove it; if the model does not have
an Explosive token, it gains one.

After a model with an Explosive token is killed, the
model that killed it makes a neutral Strategy marker
within 1" of the killed model, if able. Models may move
on top of Strategy markers.
plant_explosives.scoring_text:
At the end of every turn, each crew counts how many
friendly Strategy markers they have completely on the
enemy table half. The crew with the highest total gains 1
VP. In the case of a tie, both crews gain 1 VP.
plant_explosives.additional_vp_text:
Once per crew per game, at the end of the turn this
crew gains 1 VP if there are two or more friendly Strategy
markers in the enemy deployment zone.
plant_explosives.raw_text:
PLANT EXPLOSIVES

scorepD vP: QOOO0

SETUP

After deployment, each non-peon model in play gains
an Explosive token.

RULES

A model with an Explosive token may take the Interact
action to remove the token and make a friendly Strategy
marker within 1", and not within 4" of another friendly
Strategy marker. Explosive tokens may not be removed
in any other way.

A model may target a Strategy marker with the
Interact action to remove it; if the model does not have
an Explosive token, it gains one.

After a model with an Explosive token is killed, the
model that killed it makes a neutral Strategy marker
within 1" of the killed model, if able. Models may move
on top of Strategy markers.

SCORING

At the end of every turn, each crew counts how many
friendly Strategy markers they have completely on the
enemy table half. The crew with the highest total gains 1
VP. In the case of a tie, both crews gain 1 VP.

ADDITIONAL VP

Once per crew per game, at the end of the turn this
crew gains 1 VP if there are two or more friendly Strategy
markers in the enemy deployment zone.

recover_evidence.name: Recover Evidence
recover_evidence.setup_text:
After deployment zones are chosen, starting with
the attacker, each player makes one Strategy marker
completely on the enemy table half.
recover_evidence.rules_text:
After a model is killed by the enemy crew, the enemy
makes a Strategy marker within 3" of the killed model.

A model may target a friendly Strategy marker with
the Interact action to remove the marker and put it
onto that crew's crew card. Models may move on top of
Strategy markers.
recover_evidence.scoring_text:
At the end of every turn, the crew with the most
Strategy markers on its crew card gains 1 VP. Inthe case
of a tie, both crews gain 1 VP. All crews then remove all
Strategy markers from their crew cards.
recover_evidence.additional_vp_text:
Once per crew per game, at the end of any friendly
activation, this crew may select a piece of terrain
within 6" of the enemy deployment zone and remove
anumber of friendly Scheme markers equal to the turn

recover_evidence.raw_text:
RECOVER EVIDENCE

scorepD vP: QOOO0

SETUP

After deployment zones are chosen, starting with
the attacker, each player makes one Strategy marker
completely on the enemy table half.

RULES

After a model is killed by the enemy crew, the enemy
makes a Strategy marker within 3" of the killed model.

A model may target a friendly Strategy marker with
the Interact action to remove the marker and put it
onto that crew's crew card. Models may move on top of
Strategy markers.

SCORING

At the end of every turn, the crew with the most
Strategy markers on its crew card gains 1 VP. Inthe case
of a tie, both crews gain 1 VP. All crews then remove all
Strategy markers from their crew cards.

ADDITIONAL VP

Once per crew per game, at the end of any friendly
activation, this crew may select a piece of terrain
within 6" of the enemy deployment zone and remove
anumber of friendly Scheme markers equal to the turn
number from within 1" of it to gain 1 VP.
